channel.title: "already online" error
channel.description:
This comes up usually, while the server is run..
[code]java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 3422 at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:20538) at client.packetProcess(client.java:16883) at client.process(client.java:16853) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:50) at ServerManager$1.run(ServerManager.java:353) java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 3422 at client.process(client.java:16626) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:50) at ServerManager$1.run(ServerManager.java:353)[/code]
It ALWAYS comes up, and everytime it happens, it makes everyone unable to log in, and it will say "Already logged in"....
Does anyone know how to fix this?
